question: Is it all a huge pile of AI-generated slop or something?
answer: No, every newsletter issue here is written by [yours truly](https://fyodor.io), humane as possible (at least for now 🤖). As I mention in the [About](/about) section though, I'm not a native English speaker (go try to stop my writing through that! 😅) so I use AI for grammatical error corrections, punctuation consistency, and some stupidity control. But not more. The ideas and texts are mine, no matter how AI-level-dumb they sound sometimes.
